comments.comment: I wonder if you have lost your mind even to think Gotabhaya is an option. MURDERING CITIZENS OF THE COUNTRY IS CLEARLY NOT A FEATURE OF DEMOCRACY, as you might know. Someone who has blood on his hands, sold the country's land to foreigners, committed financial crimes and signed up to deals with USA to undermine the sovereignty and territorial integrity of Sri Lanka. Bring him in, the  country will end up A " VASSAL STATE", A "SLAVE NATION" of USA by taking it to the next level through SOFA. SRI LANKA HAS SUFFERED ENOUGH FOR 71 YEARS AT THE HANDS OF CORRUPT, ROGUE CRIMINALS SUCH AS THESE. LAST THING THE COUNTRY NEEDS IS ANOTHER AUTOCRATIC, DESPOTIC TYRANT. I HOPE YOU AGREE.
comments.author: NiFtY

comments.comment: Representative Democracy: In NAGANANDA'S Election Manifesto he is asking for a DEMOCRATIC MANDATE from the people of the country to enact the Proposed New Constitution. IF AND WHEN people VOTE for NAGANANDA with a MAJORITY, immediately afterwards, the old constitution becomes automatically invalid,void, invalidated, rescinded, worthless or powerless and be abolished/repealed. The NEW CONSTITUTION BECOMES THE LAW OF THE LAND. In other words, it's called, Representative Democracy. Political POWER EXERCISED BY THE PEOPLE of the country. It can be done not just by NAGANANDA, by any representative of the people, for that matter. 100% DEMOCRATIC, CONTRACTUALLY OBLIGATED, LEGALLY BINDING AND MOST OF ALL, DOABLE.
comments.author: NiFtY
